hypothesis_content.title: MSTR Extreme Premium/Discount to NAV Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When MicroStrategy (MSTR) stock price deviates from its implied Bitcoin NAV per share by more than ±25%, the premium/discount will narrow by at least 10 percentage points within 5 trading days, regardless of broader crypto regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a leveraged Bitcoin proxy. Extreme premiums invite arbitrage (short MSTR, long BTC). Extreme discounts make it a cheap BTC call option, attracting buyers. The market mechanics of ETFs, arbitrage desks, and relative value traders enforce a long-term anchor to NAV.
entry_conditions: Calculate MSTR Premium = (MSTR Price / Implied BTC NAV per Share) - 1

exit_conditions.take_profit: Absolute premium narrows by 10 percentage points (e.g., from +30% to +20%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Absolute premium widens by an additional 5 percentage points

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The absolute premium fails to narrow by at least 10 percentage points within 5 days in > 35% of extreme deviation instances.
